channel.title: Course on Paul C. Lambert
channel.description: Recent content in Course on Paul C. Lambert

item.title: Course: Cancer Predictions: Model-based approaches using Stata
item.description: I am teaching a 1 day course with Mark Rutherford on the use of Age Period Cohort (APC) models for predictions of cancer incidence an mortality. This take place before the Intenational Association of Cancer Registries conference in Utrect on 16th October 2017.

item.title: Course: Competing Risks and multi-state models
item.description: I am teaching a new three day course with Michael Crowther on competing risks and multi-state models at the Swiss Epidemiology Winter School, 15th-18th January 2018. Details on how to register can be found here. Practicals will be conducted in Stata, making use of the multistate package in Stata. We plan to run this course in Leicester and in Stockholm, sometime in 2018.
